text: Ne olwa Omurumwa yaboolela mulala khubakhaye be likhuwa liobwifisi, mana omukhaye oyo shingala yalirusia habulafu, ne Nyasaye namanyia Omurumwa, yamwechesia ebuleka ne nakhaya okhumwechesia elubeka wundi. Olwa yamuboolela ario, omukhaye oyo naboola mbu: “wina ukhuboolele kano?” Omurumwa naboola mbu: “Omumanyi wamakhuwa koosi niye umboolele.”
